page.title: 16Law and Order. Policing
page.content: Chepstow Police has a strength of 1 inspector,4 uniform sergeants,1 crime inspection detective,2 detective constables,17 policemen and 2 police women.The community policeman's job is to patrol the area,get to know the people and help in any activities.The community policeman finds find walking much better than going in a car because he is able to stop and talk to people.The busiest time for him is 11:00 to 15:00 and 22:30 to 24:00.The most common crime in this area is theft and criminal damage.A community policeman works from 09:00 to 17:00 and from 17:00 to 01:00.The community policeman helps everybody young and old.
